title: Problems loading in and then not staying connected in game
body:
Has been happening since I patched, loading into a game, receiving error message about network connection, reconnecting and loading into game, then keeps disconnecting...

My internet is fine otherwise :(

replies.body:
My net's been f'ed up hardcore since the heavy rain a couple days back
My ping is constant 40 but i get latency delays every 10 seconds then would disconnect and reconnect itself after another 10 sec etc.
That happens throughout the entire game.
I'm with Telstra in Melbourne, but I tried using Vodafone Data but still does the same.
